pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Based Tensor Clustering // Performs model-based tensor clustering methods including Tensor Gaussian Mixture Model (TGMM), Tensor Envelope Mixture Model (TEMM) by Deng and Zhang (2021) DOI: 10.1111/biom.13486, Doubly-Enhanced EM (DEEM) algorithm by Mai, Zhang, Pan and Deng (2021) DOI: 10.1080/01621459.2021.1904959.
